This template is fully customizable on which the majority of visible content can be set by an external XML file. Colors, buttons, images, background pattern, music, text among others will be readen through a XML file. The module you are seeing now is the LONG TEXT MODULE that reads an external XML file with text and displays it like regular HTML text (you can use HTML tags). The scrollbar will be set automatically according to your text. The image displayed and title are also obtained from the XML file.
